name: Forced Painlink
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You connect the minds of up to four creatures within range. Whenever any connected creature takes damage, all connected creatures take damage equal to half the damage of the source, or two times your spellcasting stat, whichever is lower. A creature can only take shared damage once from any given source of damage.

You never take damage from this spell.

At the start of each of your turns, every affected creature (except you, if you are a target) must make an Intuition saving throw. On a success, they are no longer affected.
empower: Instead affects all creatures you choose within 30 feet.
